question: What are the genders of <yifei>, <zhangwei>, and <meijia>? A. girl, boy, girl. B. boy, girl, boy.
Which roles often wear formal attire? A. <zhangwei> and <ziqiao>. B. <yifei> and <meijia>.
Do <yifei> and <meijia> have long hair? A. Yes. B. No.
Which roles are often seen in casual clothing? A. <zhangwei> and <ziqiao>. B. <yifei> and <meijia>.
Who among <zhangwei> and <ziqiao> is often seen in a suit? A. <zhangwei>. B. <ziqiao>.
